GK16mamkavpu:3908: atra latā vibhrājate na tu vibhrājase iti saṃbodhyamānaniṣṭhasya parabhāgasya asaṃbodhyamānaviṣayatayā vyatyāsāt puruṣabhedaḥ /
GK16mamkavpu:3911: ityādau ca gaṅgā pravahati na tu pravahatu iti apravṛttapravartanātmano vidheḥ / evañjātīyakasya cānyasyārthasya upamānagatasyāsaṃbhavādvidhyādibhedaḥ //
GK16mamkavpu:3912_0: nanu samānam uccāritaṃ pratīyamānaṃ vā dharmāntaramupādāya paryavasitāyām upamāyām
GK16mamkavpu:3913_0: avagamyate yathā {yudhiṣṭhira ivāyaṃ satyaṃ vadati} iti tatra yudhiṣthira iva satyavādyayaṃ
GK16mamkavpu:3913_1: satyaṃ vadatīti pratipatsyāmahe / satyavādī satyaṃ vadatīti ca na paunaruktyam āśaṅkanīyam
GK16mamkavpu:3914_0: yudhiṣthira iva satyavadanena satyavādyayamityarthāvagamāt / satyametat kiṃ tu sthiteṣu
GK16mamkavpu:3914_1: prayogeṣu samarthanamidaṃ na tu sarvathā niravadyam prastutavastupratītivyādhātāditi
GK16mamkavpu:3918: atra kāvyasya śaśinā arthānāṃ ca raśmibhiḥ sādharmyaṃ kutrāpi na pratītamityanucitārthatvam /
GK16mamkavpu:3924: atrāpi jvalantyombudhārāḥ sūryamaṇḍalāt niṣpatantyo na saṃbhavantītyupanibadhyamāno 'rtho 'naucityameva puṣṇāti //
GK16mamkavpu:3925_0: utprekṣāyāmapi saṃbhāvanaṃ dhruvevādaya eva śabdā vaktuṃ sahante na yathāśabdo 'pi
GK16mamkavpu:3925_1: kevalasyāsya sādhārmyameva pratipādayituṃ paryāptatvāt tasya cāsyāmavivakṣitatvāditi
GK16mamkavpu:3930_0: utprekṣitamapi tāttvikena rūpeṇa parivarjitatvāt nirupākhyaprakhyam / tatsamarthanāya
GK16mamkavpu:3930_1: yat arthāntaranyāsopādānam tat ālekhyamiva gaganataletyantamasamīcīnamiti nirviṣayatvametasya /
GK16mamkavpu:3934_0: atrācetanasya tamaso divākarāttrāsa eva na saṃbhavatīti kuta eva tatprayojitamadriṇā
GK16mamkavpu:3934_1: paritrāṇam / saṃbhāvitena tu rūpeṇa pratibhāsamānasyāsya na kācidanupapattiravataratīti
GK16mamkavpu:3935: sādhāraṇaviśeṣaṇavaśādeva samāsoktiranuktamapi upamānaviśeṣaṃ prakāśayatīti tasyātra punarupādāne prayojanābhāvāt anupādeyatvaṃ yat tat apuṣṭārthatvaṃ punaruktaṃ vā doṣaḥ / yathā
GK16mamkavpu:3939: atra tigmaruceḥ kakubhāṃ ca yathā sadṛśaviśeṣaṇavaśena vyaktiviśeṣaparigraheṇa ca nāyakatayā nāyikātvena ca vyaktiḥ,
GK16mamkavpu:3940: tathā grīṣmadivasaśriyo 'pi pratināyikātvena bhaviṣyatīti kiṃ dayitayeti svaśabdopādānena //
GK16mamkavpu:3941: śleṣopamāyāstu sa viṣayaḥ yatropamānasyopādānamantareṇa sādhāraṇeṣvapi viśeṣaṇeṣu na tathā pratītiḥ / yathā
GK16mamkavpu:3945: aprastutapraśaṃsāyāmapi upameyam anayaiva rītyā pratītaṃ na punaḥ prayogeṇa kadarthatāṃ neyam / yathā
GK16mamkavpu:3948: khadyoto 'pi na kampate pracalituṃ madhye 'pi tejasvināṃ
GK16mamkavpu:3951: atra acetanasya prabhoraprastutaviśiṣṭasāmānyadvāreṇābhivyaktau na yuktameva punaḥ kathanam //
GK16mamkavpu:3952: tadeta alaṅkāradoṣāḥ yathāsaṃbhāvinonye 'pyevañjātīyakāḥ pūrvoktayaiva doṣajātyā antarbhāvitāḥ na pṛthag pratipādanamarhantīti saṃpūrṇamidaṃ kāvyalakṣaṇam //142//
GK16mamkavpu:3954: na tadvicitraṃ yadamutra samyagvinirmitā saṃghaṭanaiva hetuḥ //1//}
